content: The proposed Center for Weather Innovation and Smart Energy and Resilience (WISER) aims to provide state-of-the-art weather and climate information combined with leading edge industry-inspired research and development to empower and safeguard the energy industry of the future. We envision WISER to become a leading energy industry-academia partnership, advancing research and cutting-edge technologies to continually improve power grid efficiency and reliability in the face of a changing climate and transition to clean energy.
